name: Black Ops Sniper Team
description:
Your beloved skyscraper city is under occupation from enemy forces. As last surviving unit, it's time to pay back what city has invested in you. Justice must be done of their atrocities, revenge must be taken of fallen soldiers.

Game Story
Plan is to reach on rooftops of nearby buildings and kill the monsters who occupying your streets. Enemy may be camouflage behind vehicles, target the vehicles or aim for head shots. Don't waste this lifetime opportunity , be the hero of nation, the leader of this best sniper team of shooters.
Don't hesitate, glory waits you. Instil fear in your enemy hearts in this fatal face off.

Feature
- You are not alone but with Four Sniper Force Team members
- carefully military planned sniper missions, alone and with sniper team
- specially designed sniper rifles
- wonderful skyscraper city buildings environment
- get high adrenaline with this thriller game play
-

How to Play
- Swipe left center of screen to move the aim
- Right side will show you the team member under attack.
- move from one player to next by taping on the four buttons
- keep eye on enemies who keep moving from one sector to next.
- each sniper team member focuses on the different sector.
